title: EuroCheck Company Database
description: Schema for the EuroCheck companies.json database file

version.description: Semantic version of the data file

generated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this file was generated

Company.description: A company record with ownership and EU status information

id.description: Unique identifier (lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens, e.g., 'apple-inc', 'sap')

hq_country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of headquarters (e.g., 'DE', 'US', 'FI')

parent_company.description: ID of the direct parent company (foreign key to another company.id), null if independent

ultimate_parent.description: ID of the ultimate parent company at the top of the ownership chain, null if this is the ultimate parent

eu_status.description: EU classification: 'eu' = HQ and ownership in EU/EEA/CH, 'mixed' = EU presence but non-EU ultimate parent, 'non-eu' = non-European company

confidence.description: Confidence level in the data: 'high' = verified from official sources, 'medium' = reliable secondary sources, 'low' = unverified or conflicting sources

sources.description: Array of source URLs for verification (Wikidata, official filings, news articles)

last_verified.description: ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) when this record was last verified

aliases.description: Alternative names, former names, or common abbreviations

notes.description: Additional notes about ownership complexity or special cases
